#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        sort(n.begin(),n.end());
        int i=0;
        while(i<n.length()&&n[i]=='0')
            i++;
        swap(n[0],n[i]);
            if(n.compare(m)==0)
                cout<<"AC\n";
            else
                cout<<"WA\n";


    }
    return 0;
}
